text:
Skip.it | iOS Engineer, Machine Learning Engineer | New York City | Onsite| Full-time | http://www.skip.it/

SKIP is the next generation retail operating system powered by a patent-pending RFID and computer vision solution. We're hiring talented individuals to build incredible technology that will transform the retail industry.

Our technology locates RFID tags 1000x faster and with 400x more location accuracy than existing solutions. This enables us to revolutionize store operations, completely eliminate checkout lines and create e-commerce quality data and analytics for the physical world. Weâ€™re building new technology from scratch to solve existing and future problems, and we're having a great time doing it.

Apply here: http://www.skip.it/jobs/
